content:
Hello people. I really want to read this paper: https://academic.oup.com/jigpal/advance-article-abstract/doi/10.1093/jigpal/jzab022/6311410?redirectedFrom=fulltext

However I'm not at a university and I don't have any way to access it (it's not on sci-hub either). Is it possible for someone who has journal access to DM a copy me? I will be extremely grateful.
Did it. :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
